example.name: transitive
example.text: The board is dominated by the heirs of the late John T. Dorrance Jr., who *trace* controlled about 58% of Campbell's stock when he died in April.
example.arg: who -> the late John T. Dorrance Jr.

example.name: passive/relative clause
example.text: ...[NL Industries]-1, controlled *trace*-1 by Dallas investor Harold Simmons...

predicate.note: Frames file for 'control' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. (!!)
